subject: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Sir ,
I was delegated  from the ( European Union ) in collaboration with the World Bank  Payment Committee  for  immediate  grant disbursement  of  US$567,000  to each  scam victim .
Your name was among the list of the approved beneficiaries for  immediate  payment .
In view of the above , we received an Affidavit of Oath from Mr.Shrikant Madhave   who claimed  that you are DEAD  and that he is  your Cousin /Next of Kin and  eligible by law  to claim your above stated fund with bank account details {  Bank of India ,A/c Name:  Shrikant Madhave  ,A/c No: 052210110000007 .}
Are you alife ? . Did you authorize Mr.Shrikant Madhave   to claim your approved funds with the above bank details  ?. 
Please reply with your  banking  details  and WHATSAPP NUMBER   to  this Email: 
tomaszskrzelinski@gmail.com
     to  avoid transfer to the wrong beneficiary .
Warm Regards,
Mr.Tomasz Skrzelinski

subject: Re:   Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. As for Madhave, I don't recall authorizing anyone by that name to claim any funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about this situation? How did my name end up on this list? And what exactly does this grant entail?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Attention :  Mr.William    ,
I'm pleased to acknowledge receipt of your mail with contents noted .
However , It is with trust and sincerity that I approach you for assistance
to transfer some funds into your bank account.
Please  accept my apology if my mail infringes on your personal ethics.

Similarly , I would like you to act as the NEXT OF KIN to my
deceased  client, who made a deposit of $12.5 Million USD only with a
Commercial Bank a few
years back. He died in a crash with his immediate family which includes his
daughter the documented Next of Kin and as such the funds
now have an open beneficiary mandate in the Bank,

This means that any person with access to the documents can act as the
NEXT OF KIN to the deceased and claim the inheritance funds without any
risk involved. More so, I have received an official letter from the Bank
suggesting a likely proceeding for confiscation of the Fund in
line with existing laws by the Bank in which my client deposited .

According to the Government Law as provided in section 129 sub
63(N), Geneva Banking Edit of 1961 at the expiration of 12 years the fund
will revert to the ownership of the  United States  Government, if nobody
applies to claim the fund.

My proposition to you is to present you to the Bank as the NEXT OF KIN and
Beneficiary of my deceased client so that the Bank will pay this
$12.5 Million USD to you , then both of us will share the amount on
a mutually agreed percentage of 40% for me and 60% for you.

All legal Documents to back up this claim as the deceased NEXT OF KIN  will
be provided by me. All I require is your honest cooperation to
enable us to see this transaction through. I guarantee you that this will
be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you
from any breach of the law.

You are therefore requested to furnish me with the following details to
enable me process all the vital documents and submit to the bank
for approval /transfer of the fund to your nominated bank account .

(1) Your full name
(2) Your full address
(3) Your Whatsapp Mobile number
(4) Your identity proof

Kindly revert back on receipt.
Cordially Yours,
Collin Hamilton
=====================

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello Collin Hamilton,

Thank you for reaching out to me with such an interesting proposition. I must say, it's not every day that one receives an email of this nature. 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please tell me more about your deceased client? It's quite sad to hear about his tragic demise along with his family.

Also, could you provide more details on how the process of claiming these funds would work? I'm not very familiar with banking laws and procedures, especially those in Geneva.

Lastly, I'd like to know more about you. How long have you been working in this field and how did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Mr.William ,
I'm pleased to acknowledge receipt of your mail and sorry for my belated
response as it was due to my busy schedule .
My deceased client  who died with his wife and daughter are : Dr.*Myles
Munroe*, his wife Mrs.*Ruth Monroe*, his daughter Miss.*Charisa*

VIEW MY CLIENT  AND FAMILY  HERE :  https://www.stephaniedaily.com/?p=3975

Regarding the process of claiming the fund :
As a Financial Attorney , i will assemble all legal documents in your name
and submit same to the bank for approval of the fund in your favour . All
legal documents will be sent to you for your record purposes . Upon the
submission of all legal documents to the bank , then the bank will approve
the funds in your favor and an International offshore Online bank account
will be open in your name while the username and password will be sent to
you . The total fund valued $12.5 million will be credited into your Online
offshore bank account , you will login into the online bank account and
transfer fund bit by bit to any bank account of your choice .

Finally, I got your contact through the European business Directory in my
bid searching for Honest /trustworthy personality to handle this project
and I found you worthy to be my partner  ..

You are therefore requested to furnish me with the following details to
enable me process all the vital documents and submit to the bank
for approval /transfer of the fund to your nominated bank account .

(1) Your full name
(2) Your full address
(3) Your Whatsapp Mobile number
(4) Your identity proof

Kindly revert back on receipt.
Cordially Yours,
Collin Hamilton
Mobile /Whatsapp : + 1 515 442 7395

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello Collin Hamilton,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting proposal you have there. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? For instance, what are the legal documents that need to be assembled in my name? And how does an offshore online bank account work?

Also, could you tell me more about the European business Directory where you found my contact? I wasn't aware that my details were listed there.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Mr.William ,
I'm pleased to acknowledge receipt of your mail and sorry for my belated
response as it was due to my busy schedule .
The legal documents that will be processed and send to you are as follows
(1) Death Certificate of my deceased client
(2) Affidavit of Oath from the Court
(3) Probate Attestation Letter from the High Court

An offshore Online bank account is a bank account which we shall open in
your name and you can operate the online bank account in any part of the
World through online banking , you will be able to login into your online
bank account with a Username and password , as soon as you login into
nthe online bank account , you will be able to make transfer of fund to any
bank account of your choice in any part of the world .
Please contact me through whatsapp for any more clarification .
Kindly revert back on receipt.
Cordially Yours,
Collin Hamilton
Mobile /Whatsapp : + 1 515 442 7395
===========================================

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello Collin Hamilton,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the time you've taken to explain everything so clearly. It's all a bit new to me, but I'm trying my best to understand.

The documents you mentioned sound very official and important. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what each one means? For example, what is an Affidavit of Oath and why is it necessary in this case?

Also, the concept of an offshore online bank account sounds intriguing. How does it work exactly? Is it safe and secure? And how would I go about setting one up?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Dear Mr.William ,
I'm pleased to acknowledge receipt of your mail with contents therein .
However, I have given enough detailed explanations which will enable you to
understand all procedures .
Hence , if you are ready for this transaction , do send all requested
details to enable us to move forward .
Please contact me through whatsapp for any more clarification .
Kindly revert back on receipt.
Cordially Yours,
Collin Hamilton
Mobile /Whatsapp : + 1 515 442 7395
===========================================

subject: Re: Dear Sir ,
body:
Hello Collin Hamilton,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to hear that you've provided detailed information. However, I must admit, some parts of your message are a bit unclear to me. Could you perhaps elaborate on the procedures you mentioned? 

Also, I'm not quite comfortable sharing my personal details just yet. Is there any other way we could proceed without them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
